title: Now Offering Catering Services!
content: Let us bring the comfort of The Cozy Corner Cafe to your next event. From office lunches to family gatherings, we've got you covered. Call us for details!

title: Senior Discount - 10% Off
content: Seniors 65+ receive 10% off their entire meal every day. Thank you for being part of our community!

title: Free WiFi Available
content: Stay connected while you enjoy your meal. Ask your server for the WiFi password.

title: Early Closing This Friday
content: We will be closing 2 hours early this Friday. Regular hours will resume next week.
